assignment2

Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment2.Code

  • public class Code
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for running the Mastermind program. Starts the game and prompts with instructions Gets initial game variables from the player, such as if the secret code should be shown or hidden. Creates a new game instance and runs the game
    Author:
    Brad Gray and Jake George, EE422C

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String codeToString()
      Returns the given Code in a String of characters only
      Feedback compareCodes(Code playerGuess)
      Compares the implicit code object with the passed parameter code object
      void generateSolution()
      Generates the computer's secret code.
      boolean getNextGuess()
      Asks for and gets next guess from player.
      int numberOfPegs()
      Returns the size of the solution
      void resetCode()
      Resets/clears the implicit Code object

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • generateSolution

        public void generateSolution()
        Generates the computer's secret code. Works for any size code or number of colors.
        Secret code stored with Game instance

      • codeToString

        public java.lang.String codeToString()
        Returns the given Code in a String of characters only
        Returns:
        Code in string format

      • getNextGuess

        public boolean getNextGuess()
        Asks for and gets next guess from player. Stores guess in implicit Code parameter
        Returns:
        True if next guess is a request for guess history. False if guess is valid code guess
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - if input not equal to Code size or if guess contains invalid colors

      • compareCodes

        public Feedback compareCodes(Code playerGuess)
        Compares the implicit code object with the passed parameter code object
        Parameters:
        playerGuess - The player's guess as a Code object
        Returns:
        turnResult Feedback object containing the results of the comparison

      • numberOfPegs

        public int numberOfPegs()
        Returns the size of the solution
        Returns:
        numPegs The size (number of pegs) of the solution

      • resetCode

        public void resetCode()
        Resets/clears the implicit Code object
